message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know this is a good deal for you to start.
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time, Alice.  Remember, time is money!
I understand time is money Bob, but so is fairness. This is my counter-offer.
Okay Alice, let's meet in the middle. This offer accounts for the time pressure, but it's more than fair for both of us.
This is a fair compromise, Bob.  We're running out of time to make a deal.
